articles.title: Greece native, battling cancer, helps others doing the same - 13WHAM-TV
articles.description: World Pancreatic Cancer Awareness Day was Thursday. It comes with a reminder of the families in the Rochester community who are dealing with it. As of last month, that includes Rick Schiffhauer of Greece. "I think it was Oct. 1st that my doctor called and sai…
